description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB Table role definitions.

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role definition create
commands.summary: Create a Table role definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role definition create --account-name
                                         --body
                                         --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb table role definition create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --body @role-definition.json

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role definition delete
commands.summary: Delete a Table role definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role definition delete --account-name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --role-definition-id
                                         [--yes]
examples: az cosmosdb table role definition delete --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-definition-id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role definition exists
commands.summary: Check if an Azure Cosmos DB role definition exists.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role definition exists --account-name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --role-definition-id
examples: az cosmosdb table role definition exists --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-definition-id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role definition list
commands.summary: List all Table role definitions under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role definition list --account-name
                                       --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb table role definition list --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role definition show
commands.summary: Show the properties of a Table role definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role definition show --account-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       --role-definition-id
examples: az cosmosdb table role definition show --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-definition-id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role definition update
commands.summary: Update a Table role definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role definition update --account-name
                                         --body
                                         --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb table role definition update --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --body @role-definition.json
